nodes.text: Sirona Okeefe was a Human female from Brentaal IV in the time prior to the Clone Wars. The aunt of Platt Okeefe, Sirona became a smuggler and thus earned the scorn of her noble family. In the months following the end of the war, she and her ship, the Banshee, joined the Alderaanian Resistance. Her favorite companion was her pilot droid RX-13, dubbed Crash.
